quote: I tucked the Camel coupon from his cigarette pack into my pocket. A souvenir of the moment where he said maybe. I would hold on to his maybe for as long as it would take, even forever.
quote_letters: I TUCKED THE CAMEL COUPON FROM HIS CIGARETTE PACK INTO MY POCKET A SOUVENIR OF THE MOMENT WHERE HE SAID MAYBE I WOULD HOLD ON TO HIS MAYBE FOR AS LONG AS IT WOULD TAKE EVEN FOREVER
